Jesse is seen through the rearview mirror in the El Camino in the "Breaking Bad" movie teaser. Netflix/AMC

'Breaking Bad' is getting a movie 6 years after it ended. Here's a new teaser trailer for 'El Camino'

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: The Emmy-winning AMC series ended in 2013 and Netflix will be releasing a movie that centers on Jesse Pinkman, played by Aaron Paul.
